/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of trees and buildings, creating a vibrant mosaic of urban life. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The predominant colors in the image are green, blue, and gray, painting a picture of a city that is both lively and serene.
